column6: Cable completes the assembly of his team, adding a few more familiar faces to his ranks. But when he reaches out to one former X-Force member he thought he could trust, fireworks ensue. Plus, the return of a popular X-Men villainess, and the coming of Jon
column8: | penciller (cover):Rob Liefeld | writer:Fabian Nicieza | letterer:Rus Wooton
